data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Rebel Rapture Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
From spiritual to epic, there's something for everyone in this versatile new pack.

Composed by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, and inspired by some of the most beloved orchestral themes, Rebel Rapture draws on the power of voices to deliver an incredible musical medley. Whether you're looking for a spiritual theme to give your churches a feeling of awe, or want that epic hard rocking boss theme, Rebel Rapture is the pack for you! In addition to choir themes, this pack also features instrumental orchestral pieces and blazing hard rock / heavy metal themes that will find a cozy home in your projects.

This pack contains:

  • 27 music BGM themes.
  • Epic orchestral themes suitable for battles or intense encounters.
  • Classic and spiritual choir themes suitable for religious, mystical or forbidden places, energetic hard rock / metal themes.
  • .mp3, .ogg and .wav formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.

Check out our other Music Packs created by Murray Atkinson:

Wonderland Music Pack
Medieval Warfare Music Pack
Heaven and Earth Music Pack
The Agency Music Pack
Epic Strings Music Pack
Heist Music Pack
Emporium of Copper and Steel Music Pack
Sinister Hollows Music Pack
Classic Fantasy Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
